title: nf-core/clipseq pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

group.errorMessage: The group name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

replicate.errorMessage: The replicate number. The combination of the group name and replicate number for a unique sample id

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'
